reviews.review_msg: Lol the class average on the last test was 42%. That's all I have to say.

Easily the worst prof I have ever had. Zero understanding towards students and zero teaching ability, all he does in class is copy the examples from the textbook. No wonder the class average for the last 2 midterms were below 50%. NEVER TAKE HIS CLASS.

He's nice if you go and talk to him in his office hours, but his definition of teaching is basically copying the exact same examples from the textbook. The $26 textbook for this class totally SUCKS by the way, I have to use other texts to understand what is going on. He uses a different prof's exams,  exam is a lot different from what he teaches.
hes so bad at teaching never take class with him otherwise  u gonna end up dropping the course if you dont want your grades suffering.

He can't teach or speak english and always behind on lectures so he included the content up to the class which was two days before the midterm. The class average for the first midterm which is the easiest for the course was 50%. His midterm is written as confusing as his english speaking ability. I would never sign up for another class he teaches.
very helpful one on one. easy tests and tough assignments.
